body: Well this one came out over a week ago but as promised, here is the link: https://hanime.tv/videos/hentai/eroge-de-subete-wa-kaiketsu-dekiru-1

The anime adaptation was quite well made and you wouldn't thought it was a regular anime but it is not. I believe it's the same production team who made Itadaki Seieki, Gakuen XX Of The Dead, Anejiru 2, and Sei Brunehilde Gakuen.

HOLY SHIT! I just watched the animation (produced by Pink Pineapple and most likely one of the better studios) and it is so fluid and fucking HAWT, I thought I was watching a regular anime show. I'll post a link when the ENG SUBS are in.
Most likely these changes are to make that one chapter less rapey and then some bonus stuff at the end. Would love to read it in English hopefully in the future.

Slight addition and changes to the Tankoubon Panels between chapters 3 and 4 from the serial chapters plus a few extra bonus pages.

Looking forward to seeing the full translation someday.
What a waste of time! There was already a translated manga of this. Wheres the sequel of an old manga published?
Same character different plot, can i have the eng version plz?
